definition: current custom/current way of doing things
customs change with time (idiom); other times, other manners/O Tempora, O Mores!
pinyin: shi2 dai4 bu4 tong2 , feng1 shang4 bu4 tong2

sentences.chinese: 說明風尚藍灣屬於酒店式公寓。

sentences.english: I am informed that Mr Lear's daughters set the fashion of ladies' driving.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說李爾先生的女兒們開創了女子開車的新風尚。

sentences.english: Blu-ray water drum, a synonym for fashion trend.
sentences.chinese: 藍光水鼓，一個前沿風尚的代名詞。

sentences.english: The first large-scale original pieces of modern music, Blue-ray Water drum.
sentences.chinese: 大型首創原創現代鼓樂曲目《風尚男子藍光鼓》。

sentences.english: A new tide of fashion sets in.
Are you familiar with the customs here?
sentences.chinese: 你對這兒的風尚習性相熟嗎？

sentences.english: and (9) those detrimental to socialist morals or customs, or having other unhealthy influences.
sentences.chinese: 有害於社會主義道德風尚或者有其他不良影響的。

sentences.english: To respect the old and to love the young are good moral habits.
sentences.chinese: 尊老愛幼是良好的道德風尚。

sentences.english: The plays of Wilds exemplify the comedy of manners.
sentences.chinese: 王爾德的戲劇是風尚喜劇的典範。

sentences.english: In your passion for the true, people may see nothing but faddism .
sentences.chinese: 你熱烈的去追求真，而人們看到的卻不過一時的風尚。

sentences.english: on both the technical and folkloric levels.
sentences.chinese: 在技術層面和黑客社區風尚。

sentences.english: It was in Flouring Tang Dynasty that the aesthetic tendency was popular.
sentences.chinese: 這是隻有到了盛唐纔有的如此普遍的審美風尚。

sentences.english: We are going to give you a brief description of five trends that you might be interested in.
sentences.chinese: 我們將簡要地介紹五種你可能感興趣的新風尚。

sentences.english: "We've really seen a coin renaissance in the past few years, " said Henrietta Holsman Fore, director of the U.S. Mint.
sentences.chinese: 過去幾年中，我們確實看到了硬幣風尚的重新興起。

sentences.english: The customs of Li and Miao Minority attract the tourists from both at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 黎苗族的風尚吸收了來自國內外的很多遊客。

sentences.english: Hip-Hop Style, Fashion Trendsetter, Street Style;
sentences.chinese: 嘻哈風格，潮流指標，街頭風尚。

definition: to agree without prior consultation/to happen to hold the same view
appreciation of the finer things in life
surveyor's pole/post (used for a landmark)/CL:根[gen1]/(fig.) goal/model/benchmark
to advocate/to initiate/to propose/to be a proponent of (an idea or school of thought)
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
to rise/to spring up/to burgeon/to be aroused/to come into vogue
conspicuous/to make sth stand out/make sth prominent
